modName: Glass Armor - Light Crystal Blue ---- Female version
descriptionHtml:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~Description:~
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Glass Armor for female\'s.

~~~~~~~~~~
~Install:~
~~~~~~~~~~

Extract RAR file & put textures folder inside your Skyrim/Data folder.

~~~~~~~~~~~
~Unistall:~
~~~~~~~~~~~

Delete files.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~Additional Info:~
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

You have to use male version boots/helm/gauntlet as female version only has the top part and uses the rest from male, you can get it here http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=895
author: Snezko
